sources.title: Mr. Adam's Bomb (1949)
sources.description: Father dances to Jazz in the kitchen with the maid, his family won't tolerate his behaviour anymore. And now he has to deal with Uncle Adam's strange antics. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/mr-adams-bomb-1949/
